text: The 2014/15 FIS Nordic Combined World Cup was the 32nd world cup season, a combination of ski jumping and cross-country skiing organized by FIS. It started on 29 November 2014 in Ruka, Finland and ended on 14 March 2015 in Oslo, Norway. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff; font-size:86%;
